review.reviewBody: Excellent service! The laser cleaning of my metal fence was spotless. Highly recommend!
Fast and efficient. My yacht hull looks brand new after their cleaning. Thank you!
Great job on restoring my historical monument. The laser cleaning was gentle and effective.

itemOffered.name: Laser cleaning of metal surfaces
itemOffered.description: Fast and efficient removal of rust, paint, oxides, and dirt from metal structures while preserving the original texture of the material.

itemOffered.name: Facade restoration of buildings
itemOffered.description: Cleaning facades from graffiti, dirt, mold, and old paint layers while preserving the aesthetics and historical value of the building.

itemOffered.name: Cleaning of yachts and vessels
itemOffered.description: Removal of algae, old coatings, and dirt from the hulls of yachts and vessels. Preparation for painting or corrosion protection.

itemOffered.name: Restoration of sculptures and monuments
itemOffered.description: Delicate cleaning of historical monuments and sculptures from dirt, graffiti, or mold while fully preserving their structure and texture.

itemOffered.name: Cleaning and preparation of equipment for priming and painting
itemOffered.description: Laser removal of old coatings from cars, agricultural machinery, or construction machines. Preparation for further protection or painting.

itemOffered.name: Eco-friendly graffiti removal
itemOffered.description: Safe and quick removal of graffiti from facades, shop windows, sculptures, or other objects without damaging the material.

itemOffered.name: Removal of scale and oil contamination
itemOffered.description: Cleaning industrial pipes, tanks, and equipment from scale, oils, and other contaminants. Improving equipment efficiency.

itemOffered.name: Post-cleaning treatment: priming and painting
itemOffered.description: Application of primer and paint after cleaning for long-lasting protection and aesthetic appearance.

itemOffered.name: Cleaning, restoration, and painting of shutters
itemOffered.description: Cleaning shutters from graffiti, dirt, and old paint. Restoration of damaged surfaces and application of new paint to restore aesthetics.

itemOffered.name: Regular maintenance of objects
itemOffered.description: Offering continuous cleaning and surface treatment to maintain their perfect condition.
